DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect multi-focal contact lens symptomatic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Multifocal Contact Lens Symptomatic Patients
DOC.criteria: To sign informed consent form ( documented investigator Case Report Form [ CRF ] ) . Be exist daily wear spherical singlevision soft CL wearer ( extend wear last 3 month , silicone hydrogel daily wear allow ) . Between 35 47 year age ( inclusive ) . Have CL spherical distance requirement 1.00D 6.00D ( 6.50D refractive ) eye . Refractive astigmatism 0.75D less eye . Visual symptom associate near vision Be correctable visual acuity 6/9 ( 20/30 ) good eye . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : 1 . No amblyopia . 2 . No evidence lid abnormality infection . 3 . No conjunctival abnormality infection . 4 . No clinically significant slit lamp finding ( i.e . stromal haze , stain , scar , Vascularization , infiltrate abnormal opacity ) . 5 . No active ocular disease . Monovision user multifocal CL wearer . Regular user reading spectacle ( i.e . daily usage ) . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Clinically significant ( Grade 3 4 ) corneal stromal haze , corneal Vascularization , tarsal abnormality , bulbar hyperemia , limbal hyperemia , abnormality cornea would contraindicate CL wear . Corneal stain Grade 3 two region . Has anterior ocular surgery . Has ocular surgery injury within 8 week immediately prior enrollment study . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude CL fitting . Keratoconus corneal irregularity .
